content.question:
Respond to parts A, B, and C.

Describe one example of a migration of Afro-descended people prior to 1860.

Describe one cause of a migration of Afro-descended people between 1900 and 1970.

Explain how the migration of Afro-descended people to the United States influenced a social or cultural change in the twentieth century.

frqParts.text:
Respond to parts A, B, and C.

Describe one example of a migration of Afro-descended people prior to 1860.

Describe one cause of a migration of Afro-descended people between 1900 and 1970.

Explain how the migration of Afro-descended people to the United States influenced a social or cultural change in the twentieth century.

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
